current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend title 38, United States Code, to update the
		  Service-Disabled Veterans Insurance program to base premium rates on the
		  Commissioners 2001 Standard Ordinary Mortality Table instead of the
		  Commissioners 1941 Standard Ordinary Table of Mortality.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

quote.#tail: both places it appears and inserting
quote.#text:
Commissioners 1941 Standard Ordinary Table
			 of Mortality

header.#text:
Revision of basis for premium
			 rates under Service-Disabled Veterans Insurance program

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 S1585 IS: To amend title 38, United States Code, to update the Service-Disabled Veterans Insurance program to base premium rates on the Commissioners 2001 Standard Ordinary Mortality Table instead of the Commissioners 1941 Standard Ordinary Table of Mortality.
